title: Ilgynly-Depe
description: Chalcolithic settlement near Chaacha, Turkmenistan. This site was initially settled in the 5th millennium, flourished in the mid-4th, and was subsequently abandoned.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of Ilgynly-Depe after Masson 1994 and Petrie 2013.
properties.title: Approximate location of Ilgynly-Depe
